name: Captain Carnage
overview: Message from StarCom: Galactic Outpost G-109 reported a large alien vessel entering the outer rim of the galaxy. Gortly after transmission G-109 was destroyed. Two Federation Battle Ships were sent to investigate but were also destroyed. The alien vessel appears immune to all current weapon systems. Reports show that at current trajectory and velocity it will reach Earth in three days. You are our last hope Captain! We will transport you over!
